trends: There have been no other sightings in Tazewell
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home from the grocery store ne when i noticed two large lights in the sky. i noticed that one of the lights was not moving at all and the other was moving in next to the other light as i came closer to the lights i noticed the light that was moving had a blinking red light. i rolled my window down and was going 40 miles an hour as i drove underneath the object i saw they both was triangled shape with two lights on each side and one on the tip not bright white lights but the color you would see in low voltage landscaping lights in amber (they was approx 500 ft above me) i could see that they was triangled shape (dark silver in color) i watched as the moving aircraft landed ontop of the one that was not moving. i had my xm radio on ( in an area i travel twice a day everyday and have never lost my signal)i lost my signal. i turned my vehicle around to get pulled off so i could get a pic on my cellphone and i watched as the connected aircraft flew off to the west and from behind it looked like a bomber jet. i was not able to get a picture because it flew off at a high rate of speed. i first thought that it might have been some type of military aircraft that needed refueling but i have never seen a triangled shaped aircraft that could come to a complete stop and i don't think that they would refuel by landing ontop of one another. i was totally in awe of what i saw and also scared to death. i hope that maybe someone else in or around the sw area of va maybe saw something similar. i also saw on aug. 2, 2008 around 12:30 am a bright light moving at a high rate of speed and a flashing red\white light chasing it. we had several friend over that witnessed this along with myself and my husband. my husband said he thought it was one very large object, i think it was 2 possibly ufo\military.
